export var getParsedDate=function getParsedDate(strDate){var strSplitDate=String(strDate).split(' ');var date=new Date(strSplitDate[0]);// alert(date);
var dd=date.getDate();var mm=date.getMonth()+1;var yyyy=date.getFullYear();if(dd<10){dd='0'+dd;}if(mm<10){mm='0'+mm;}date=dd+"-"+mm+"-"+yyyy;return date.toString();};export var formatNumber=function formatNumber(number){var numString=number.toString();var result='';while(numString.length>3){var chunk=numString.substr(-3);numString=numString.substr(0,numString.length-3);result=','+chunk+result;}if(numString.length>0){result=numString+result;}return result;};
